section.name: jsaf-quickstart
section.p: jsaf-quickstart is a parent-POM project that will get you done with project setup and into writing code within minutes. It contains:

ul.li: jsaf-maven-plugin set up to create zip and tar.gz archives, and both Bash (*nix and Mac) and Bat (Windows) launch scripts for your commands.
maven-surefire-plugin with system properties set up to aid testing command-line scripts.
A lightweight set of dependencies including the jsaf core libraries and some of the Apache Commons libraries.
